name: Makeup Story Fashion Fever
description:
Get ready for a perfect makeover & dressed up summer. Pick fashion outfits, gorgeous cosmetics and dreamy accessories to create endless fancy makeovers for the summer beach party, wedding and other occasions. In a world of colors, become a fashion guru to choose amazing hairstyles, shining blushers, exquisite outfits, vibrant lipsticks, beautiful eye shadows and matching accessories with your ultimate fashion sense. Makeup Story Summer Season - Girls Game is the best makeover games for girls. Enjoy the ultimate makeover of the pretty fashion doll this summer season. Complete the look with unique cosmetic designs in this girls fun day magical salon game. It’s time to get creative. Make the fashion lover princess doll ready to go to the mall for beach party, shopping day out, on a date, a ball, prom night, wedding and many more events. Help her get ready with amazing makeup and accessories. The shopping fever is incomplete for this fashion beauty without getting a makeover done at your salon. This summer, impress the prince charming; her boyfriend with real makeup techniques for all occasions.

As a famous fashion blogger, take up the challenge to surprise the girls with the best makeover ever so that they can enjoy a romantic evening with their boyfriends. Make use of the hottest tips and the latest trends while doing your makeover. Play dress up and makeup with these pretty girls who wants to get prettier with a makeover for a wedding, beach party or a summer season occasion. You’ve got the wedding stuff, the beach dress up, slumber party makeover and much more to play with. Ask your model to hop in the beauty salon chair and get dolled up with eye shadow, lipstick, facial powder and much more just like a Hollywood super star. The magical world of make up and dress up is waiting for you to start working on your dream girl makeover. Express your fashion fantasies and unique style you covet with fabulous cosmetic items that fill your closet. Live out your favorite fashion hottest trends putting together different styles and looks. An ultimate royal princess makeover salon game for girls! Live out your makeover dreams with Makeup Story Summer Season. Start styling in this ultimate spa salon game for girls!

Makeup Story Summer Season features:

√ Choose beautiful colors that match the girl’s skin tone
√ Surprise her with a perfect complete makeover & dress up for the party
√ Select matching hairstyle, shoes, makeup, clothes and accessories
√ Take a picture and save it to show it to your girlfriends in the next PJ party
√ Countless cosmetic items to create glamorous looks for girls makeover
√ Various eye colors
√ variety of winged eye liner designs
√ a lot of mascara options
√ a huge palette of lip colors (lipsticks)
√ add a bit of sparkle to the lips and eyes
√ double shaded eye shadows
